title: The Toy Boy
description: When Allie meets a handsome twenty year old man on a night out with Caroline she is flattered by the attention he shows her. She gives him her number at the end of the night and finds that he starts to chase her for a date. She enjoys the flirting and teasing they share and it leads to her finally accepting his invitation for a meal. The night ends back at his apartment where Allie enjoys the fun to be had with a young lover.
author: Allie Wilder
